projects.title: Voting Dapp
projects.description: Voting decentralized application (DApp) that leverages blockchain technology to enable secure and transparent voting processes. With dVote, users can participate in elections and evaluate its full functionalities.

projects.title: WareHouse Of Crypto
projects.description: This project is a warehouse management system for cryptocurrencies. It aims to provide a user-friendly interface for managing and tracking various cryptocurrencies within a virtual warehouse.

projects.title: Chai Dapp
projects.description: Project implementing a ”Buy Me a Coffee” concept using crypto tokens for gratitude. It creates a decentralized app where users donate tokens instead of buying coffee, ensuring secure transactions. It serves as a practical learning platform showcasing decentralized apps and crypto tokens for donations and gratitude.

projects.title: E-commerce Website
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce shop utilizing PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and MySQL. Key contributions include implementing product categorization, and shopping cart management, Product design using adobe xd. The project demonstrates full-stack web development, database integration, and user authentication proficiency.

projects.title: Reminder App
projects.description: Developed a reminder app enabling users to create and manage notes with timely reminders. Implemented features for note creation, setting reminders, and receiving notifications. Utilized JAVA, XML, and Android Studio for an intuitive user interface

projects.title: MEME_Share-app
projects.description: This application is for fun only. That anyone can share diffrent type of memes to their friends

projects.title: DAO
projects.description: DAO is a self-governing organization that operates on a blockchain. It allows participants to collectively make decisions and perform actions using smart contracts, eliminating the need for intermediaries and central authority. DAOs aim to be transparent, democratic, and autonomous.
